name: Wyvern Studios Solitaire: 30th Aniversary Edition
description:
Wyvern Studios Solitaire: 30th Anniversary Edition is a tribute to the original game released in the 1990's by Wyvern Studios. It features both Klondike Solitaire and Pyramid Solitaire. It includes 9 different deck styles to choose from and features joystick support for the full experience. The base game is offered for free and can be played as is without any cost forever. We plan to offer rulesets DLC with additional solitaire versions and content DLC with more fun deck styles that you can choose to purchase, or not. We will also be offering a Solitaire Construction Set DLC that will allow you to create and share hundreds of unique solitaire creations.

The 9 deck styles in the base game include three(3) traditional playing card decks and six(6) photo decks guaranteed to be "Family Friendly!"


TRADITIONAL DECKS
  • Traditional Face Cards
  • Easy Read Alphanumeric Cards
  • Wyvern Memories Face Cards


FAMILY FRIENDLY PHOTO DECKS
  • Fireworks
  • Fungi
  • Insects
  • Minerals & Gems
  • Natural Textures
  • Space Exploration
